thread.title: Mark Davis Sitting At PF Changs, Reading A Newspaper Article About Himself With A Personal Night Light
thread.title_full: Mark Davis Sitting At PF Changs, Reading A Newspaper Article About Himself With A Personal Night Light

author: Big Cat
title: Mark Davis Sitting At PF Changs, Reading A Newspaper Article About Himself With A Personal Night Light
text:
Mark Davis Sitting At PF Changs, Reading A Newspaper Article About Himself With A Personal Night Light Big Cat | 


This is one of those situations where you post the picture and get the hell out of the way. It’s perfection. I think he is officially my favorite owner in all of sports and if I don’t someday eat lunch with him at PF Chang’s then I consider my entire life a failure. Kings do Kings things.
